name: Wooden Chair
description: True mid-century inspiration goes a lot way with the Weave Arm Chair. Boasting a familiar silhouette with a curved back and clean lines, the Carolton delivering that punch of drama that your living area or library has been seeking. The chair features a solid wood frame with a medium finish and a woven rope seat that offers textural contrast. This accent chair is perfect for the relaxed but refined sitting area, and creates a classic, natural aesthetic for the home.

name: Ganesh Handmade Carving in wood
description: Dimensions ( LxBxH ): 3 x 1.5 x 6 in. Weight: 110 gms (0.24 lb). Ganesh statue hand carved in high quality kadam wood. This lovely carving of the Hindu Elephant God weighs 110 gms and is 6 inches in height. It is believed in Hindu tradition that Lord Ganesha is the first and most auspicious of all Gods, and it is customary to seek his blessings before embarking on any new venture, educational pursuit or journey. Lord Ganesha, the son of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvati, is considered to be the remover of all obstacles in one's path. This majestic figurine of the great Lord depicts him sitting on a five-headed snake.
